title: Software Engineer
description:
Guest Ban is a hospitality SaaS company helping hotels keep guests, staff, and communities safer while speeding up front desk operations. Our platform combines ID scanning, a shared Do Not Rent network, and automated criminal and sex offender checks into a single workflow. We integrate directly with hotel PMS systems to reduce check\\-in time, chargebacks, and repeat problem guests, while improving operational efficiency and guest experience.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 We‚Äôre expanding our platform and are looking for experienced Full Stack JavaScript Developers with strong Node.js expertise who can work remotely and independently. You will take ownership of building and scaling full web applications end\\-to\\-end in a fast\\-moving, product\\-driven environment. Your work will directly impact real hotel operations used daily across the industry.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using Node.js, Express or similar frameworks, and modern JavaScript or TypeScript
* Build and maintain RESTful APIs and backend services that integrate with internal systems, third\\-party APIs, and hotel PMS platforms
* Work with MongoDB for document\\-based data models and Microsoft SQL Server for relational and transactional data
* Design database schemas, write optimized queries, and manage data consistency across multiple storage systems
* Develop frontend applications using React, Next.js, Angular, or similar frameworks
* Collaborate with desktop and scanning components by integrating backend services with local or cloud\\-based applications
* Deploy, monitor, and maintain applications using cloud infrastructure (Azure or similar platforms)
* Use Git and GitHub for version control, pull requests, and collaborative code reviews
* Support CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployments
* Debug production issues, improve performance, and build reliable, scalable solutions
* Collaborate closely with product, support, and founders to ship features that deliver immediate value to hotel partners



  





**Required Skills and Experience** 



* Strong experience with Node.js and backend JavaScript or TypeScript
* Hands\\-on experience building RESTful APIs and service\\-oriented architectures
* Experience working with MongoDB and Microsoft SQL Server in production environments
* Solid understanding of database design, indexing, performance optimization, and data integrity
* Frontend experience with React, Next.js, Angular, HTML, CSS, and modern UI frameworks
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as Azure (App Services, Functions, Storage, or similar)
* Experience using Git and GitHub in a collaborative team environment
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, or similar
* Strong debugging, problem\\-solving, and communication skills
* Ability to work independently in a fully remote setup and manage your own workload



  





**What We Offer** 




 Fully remote role
 


* Direct collaboration with the founder and core product team
* Real ownership over features used by hotels every day
* Opportunity to grow into architecture, lead engineering, or product\\-focused roles
* Salary Range: 5‚Äì7 LPA

title: Full‚ÄëStack Software Engineer (Early‚ÄëStage Startup)
description:
About the Role
 
 We‚Äôre looking for a¬†
 
 dynamic, full‚Äëstack software engineer
 
 ¬†who‚Äôs excited by ambiguity, motivated by impact, and energized by building from first principles. This is an early‚Äëstage role at an ambitious startup in the recruiting space, where you‚Äôll help shape both the product and the engineering culture.
 



 You‚Äôll work across the stack¬†
 
 alongside a long‚Äëtenured software engineer from Google
 
 ¬†and collaborate closely with¬†
 
 highly motivated, creative, and experienced business leaders who have built successful companies and products
 
 . Together, you‚Äôll take real ownership over meaningful parts of the system and help turn big ideas into production‚Äëready software.
 



 If you‚Äôre hungry to learn fast, comfortable wearing many hats, and not afraid to ask questions or challenge assumptions, you‚Äôll feel right at home.
 



  




 What You‚Äôll Do
 * Own and ship end‚Äëto‚Äëend features across frontend, backend, and infrastructure.
* Build product experiences using¬†
 
 Flutter
 
 ¬†and modern web/mobile patterns.
* Design and implement backend services in¬†
 
 Python
 
 ¬†and¬†
 
 Rust
 
 , with a focus on correctness, performance, and clarity.
* Work with¬†
 
 LLMs
 
 , embeddings, and¬†
 
 vector databases
 
 ¬†to build intelligent, AI‚Äëassisted workflows.
* Integrate and deploy services using¬†
 
 Cloudflare
 
 ¬†(Workers, Pages, queues, etc.).
* Use¬†
 
 GitHub Spec‚ÄëKit
 
 ¬†and similar tools to plan, spec, and reason about systems¬†
 *before* 
 ¬†building them.
* Write clean, well‚Äëtested, maintainable code and participate actively in code reviews.
* Collaborate asynchronously with a fully remote team, communicating progress, blockers, and ideas clearly.
* Take responsibility for large pieces of the product and follow them through from concept to production.



  




 What We‚Äôre Looking For
 

 You might be a great fit if you:
 



* Have¬†
 
 2‚Äì3\\+ years of experience
 
 ¬†as a software engineer in a fast‚Äëpaced startup or similarly high‚Äëownership environment.
* Are comfortable moving across the stack and learning new technologies quickly.
* Have working knowledge of some (not necessarily all) of the following:
* Flutter
* Python
* Rust
* Cloudflare (or comparable serverless / edge platforms)
* Vector databases, embeddings, or modern AI/ML tooling
* Understand the value of planning, writing specs, and thinking through tradeoffs before writing code.
* Ask thoughtful questions, communicate clearly, and enjoy collaborating with others.
* Take ownership seriously: when something breaks or needs improvement, you see it through.
* Are creative, curious, and motivated by building something meaningful from the ground up.



  




 Nice to Have (But Not Required)
 * Experience building AI‚Äëpowered or LLM‚Äëdriven products.
* Familiarity with recruiting, HR tech, or workflow automation tools.
* Contributions to open‚Äësource projects or strong personal side projects.
* Experience designing systems for scale, reliability, or performance.



  




 Our Culture \\& How We Work
 * Remote‚Äëfirst
 
 ¬†and async‚Äëfriendly.
* Small team, high trust, high ownership.
* We value clear thinking, good writing, and honest communication.
* We plan carefully, but move fast once we commit.
* You‚Äôll have real influence on product direction and technical decisions.



  




 Why This Role Is Different
 
 This is not a narrowly scoped ticket‚Äëtaking role. You‚Äôll help define¬†
 *what* 
 ¬†we build, not just¬†
 *how* 
 . If you‚Äôre excited by early‚Äëstage energy, modern AI‚Äëdriven tooling, and the chance to grow alongside a product from the beginning, this role offers a rare level of impact and learning.

**Company Description** 




 We're a growing fintech serving the hospitality, wellness, and experience industries in Australia and New Zealand. You'll be dealing directly with business stakeholders on a range of exciting new projects, and expected to quickly understand the company's business processes and existing systems context to ensure your solutions are fit for purpose.

title: Application Analyst
description:
**Job Title: Software Developer Lead \\-** 
 COBOL
   

  

**Location: Noida/Pune, India (5 days a week from office)**
**Job Type: Full time**
**Experience 8 To 12 Years**
**Job Description:**
 Ensures adherence to established standards and may consult with senior managers on technology solutions. Consults with project teams and functional units on the design of important projects or services. Supports existing business systems applications. Performs additional job duties as required.
   

  

**Job Specific Needs \\& Responsibilities**
* Knowledge in CICS, COBOL, JCL, VSAM \\& DB2\\. Assembler Knowledge is a plus.
* Intertest experience is a huge plus. Expert in multiple languages and tools.
* Credit/Debit or Financial knowledge. Should be quick learner, Detail\\-oriented, Multitasker.
* Ability to work in a challenging environment. Possesses strong knowledge of application development technologies, tools, methodologies as well as all functional areas in IT organization.
* Should be able to support production and should be available to support on call, as needed.
* Enhance staff accomplishments and competence by planning delivery of solutions; answering technical and procedural questions for less experienced team members; teaching improved processes; mentoring team members.


**Candidate Requirements**
* Expert in multiple languages and tools. Some knowledge in emerging technologies. Possesses strong knowledge of application development technologies, tools and methodologies.
* Good understanding of how technology relates to business, market and industry and applies such knowledge to support the needs of the business.
* Strong understanding of complex internal business processes or functions.
* Works on moderate to complex projects and issues within functional area.
* Works more independently with IT functional units and business units. Recommend strategies for improving system applications.
* Coaches and lead less experienced IT staff and business managers.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* 8\\+ yrs. of related IT experience.
* Bachelor‚Äôs Degree at College of Science, Technology, Engineering \\& Math major or equivalent work, or military experience.


**Sonata Software Overview**
 In today's market, there is a unique duality in technology adoption. On one side, extreme focus on cost containment by clients, and on the other, deep motivation to modernize their Digital storefronts to attract more consumers and B2B customers.
   

  

 As a leading Modernization Engineering company, we aim to deliver modernization\\-driven hypergrowth for our clients based on the deep differentiation we have created in Modernization Engineering, powered by our Lightening suite and 16\\-step Platformation‚Ñ¢ playbook. In addition, we bring agility and systems thinking to accelerate time to market for our clients.
   

  

 Headquartered in Bengaluru, India, Sonata has a strong global presence, including key regions in the US, UK, Europe, APAC, and ANZ. We are a trusted partner of world\\-leading companies in BFSI (Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance), HLS (Healthcare and Lifesciences), TMT (Telecom, Media, and Technology), Retail \\& CPG, and Manufacturing space. Our bouquet of Modernization Engineering Services cuts across Cloud, Data, Dynamics, Contact Centers, and around newer technologies like Generative AI, MS Fabric, and other modernization platforms.
   

  

**Why join Sonata Software?**
 At Sonata, you¬¥ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what¬¥s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world‚Äôs toughest problems. You¬¥ll be challenged, but you will not be alone. You¬¥ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

* Sonata Software is an Equal Opportunity Employer encouraging diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender identity, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status, marital status, or any other characteristics protected by law.

title: Fullstack Internship - In-office internship
description:
Duration: 3 Months.
 



 Type: Internship
 



 Location: In\\-office (Mumbai \\- Matunga Road)
 



 Stipend: Rs.5,000 \\+ conveyance upto Rs.1,500
 



 Website \\- www.axentraos.com
 



  





 Company Description
 



 Axentra OS is an innovative solution designed to simplify and enhance Shopify store operations by eliminating inefficiencies and automating processes. It serves as an all\\-in\\-one tech solution, offering capabilities such as customer account management, order processing, CRM, loyalty programs, analytics, and more. Focused on delivering seamless workflows and exceptional customer experiences, Axentra OS empowers merchants to achieve operational efficiency and scalability with minimal overhead. Our beautifully designed interface ensures effortless and refined user experiences, marking the end of e\\-commerce fragmentation.
 



  





 About the Internship
 



 We‚Äôre looking for passionate and self\\-motivated Full Stack Developer Interns who want to learn and build real\\-world projects. This internship gives you the flexibility to work on any one area ‚Äî frontend, backend or database ‚Äî or explore multiple parts of the stack based on your interests and strengths.
 



  





 You‚Äôll be part of a collaborative team working on live systems, gaining hands\\-on experience with modern tools and technologies.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



 Work on one or more of the following areas based on your chosen focus:

title: ServiceNow Developer - GRC
description:
Job Summary
 



 We are seeking an experienced ServiceNow Developer with strong expertise in GRC/IRM modules to design, develop, and implement advanced customizations on the ServiceNow platform. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience in server\\-side scripting, workflow development, and integrations, along with a solid understanding of Agile/SAFe delivery practices.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 


* Design, develop, and implement ServiceNow customizations including core platform setup, workflow administration, reporting, data imports, and third\\-party integrations.
* Perform advanced platform customizations using Business Rules, Script Includes, ACLs, UI Pages, UI Macros, UI Scripts, Client Scripts, workflows, custom tables, and reports.
* Develop and configure workflows and automation for ServiceNow platform applications.
* Program enhancements, workflows, and integrations across ServiceNow modules.
* Ensure best practices in server\\-side scripting and platform development.
* Support data loads, platform configurations, and continuous improvement initiatives.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams in an Agile/SAFe delivery environment.
* Participate in design discussions, code reviews, and solution architecture planning.



 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 


* 3\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in ServiceNow GRC/IRM modules.
* Strong expertise in Business Rules, Script Includes, ACLs, and server\\-side scripting.
* Experience in workflow design, configuration, and development on ServiceNow.
* Proven experience with platform customization and integrations.
* Good understanding of Agile and/or SAFe methodologies.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.



 Preferred Qualifications
 


* ServiceNow certifications (CSA / CAD / GRC\\-related certifications).
* Experience working in enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow implementations.

title: Flutter Developer Intern
description:
**Job description

 per month

title: Tech Lead ‚Äì MERN Stack
description:
**Job Description** 




  





 We are looking for a Tech Lead (MERN Stack) who will be responsible for technical architecture, hands\\-on development, and leading a small engineering team. This role is ideal for a senior engineer who enjoys coding daily while guiding the team and owning delivery in a startup environment.
 



  





 You will work closely with the Product team to build scalable, production\\-grade web applications from scratch and evolve them as the product grows.

 Technical Ownership
 



  




* Own system architecture and technical decisions

* Ensure application performance, security, and reliability

* Write production\\-quality code using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB
* Build and maintain REST APIs
* Handle authentication, authorization, and core business logic

**Team Leadership** 




  




* Lead and mentor 2‚Äì5 engineers

**Startup \\& Scale** 



* Build systems from 0 ‚Üí MVP ‚Üí scale

**Required Skills \\& Experience** 




  




* 5‚Äì7 years of professional software development experience

* Excellent JavaScript (ES6\\+) fundamentals

**Good to Have**

* Cloud knowledge (AWS / GCP / Azure)
* Docker, CI/CD pipelines
* Microservices or modular backend experience
* Early\\-stage startup experience

title: Tech Lead - (Angular/Java)
description:
**Company Description**
 Entain India is the engineering and delivery powerhouse for Entain, one of the world‚Äôs leading global sports and gaming groups. Established in Hyderabad in 2001, we‚Äôve grown from a small tech hub into a dynamic force, delivering cutting\\-edge software solutions and support services that power billions of transactions for millions of users worldwide.
   

  

 Our focus on quality at scale drives us to create innovative technology that supports Entain‚Äôs mission to lead the change in global sports and gaming sector. At Entain India, we make the impossible possible, together.
   

  

**Job Description**
 As an Angular Tech Lead, you will oversee the end\\-to\\-end delivery of a cross\\-functional team.
   

  

 Reporting to the Engineering Manager within the Product \\& Tech Team. You will work closely with the Product Owner to plan, execute, and evaluate team results.
   

  

 Are you ready to be a part of our journey delivering excellence and collaborating with one of the world's biggest online gaming and entertainment groups?
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Deliver high\\-quality technical solutions and ensure impactful outcomes.
* Address risks such as technical debt, system downtime, and security issues.
* Lead design reviews and maintain accountability for system designs.
* Track and report on deliveries and Non\\-Functional Requirements (NFR) metrics.
* Negotiate trade\\-offs between scope, speed, and quality with Product Owners.
* Balance team urgency with burnout prevention and monitor team pace.
* Provide technological context for complex features and guide team members.
* Participate in cross\\-team initiatives and knowledge sharing through workshops.
* Proficiently apply and adapt Agile/XP SDLC practices.
* Engage in recruitment, mentorship, and performance management.
* Set and communicate clear team goals aligned with business strategy, fostering a motivating work environment.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* 8‚Äì12 years of experience in software development, with strong expertise in Angular (v10\\+).
* Proven experience in leading technical teams, mentoring developers, and owning end\\-to\\-end project delivery.
* Strong knowledge of TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, RxJS, and Angular frameworks (components, services, modules, routing).
* Experience with Angular performance tuning, reusable components, state management (NgRx or similar), and responsive design.
* Basic to intermediate understanding of Java (Spring Boot preferred) for backend development and integration.
* Hands\\-on experience with RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and JSON\\-based communication between frontend and backend.
* Familiarity with database concepts (SQL/NoSQL) and writing efficient queries.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Git version control, and Agile/Scrum methodologies.
* Knowledge of unit testing and integration testing tools such as Jasmine, Karma, JUnit, Mockito, etc.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) is an added advantage.


**Additional Information**
 We know that signing top players requires a great starting package, and plenty of support to inspire peak performance. Join us, and a competitive salary is just the beginning.
   

  

 Depending on your role and location, you can expect to receive benefits like:
   

  

* Safe home pickup and home drop (Hyderabad Office Only)
* Group Mediclaim policy
* Group Critical Illness policy
* Communication \\& Relocation allowance
* Annual Health check


 And outside of this, you‚Äôll have the chance to turn recognition from leaders and colleagues into amazing prizes. Join a winning team of talented people and be a part of an inclusive and supporting community where everyone is celebrated for being themselves.
   

  

 At Entain India, we do what‚Äôs right. It‚Äôs one of our core values and that‚Äôs why we're taking the lead when it comes to creating a diverse, equitable and inclusive future \\- for our people, and the wider global sports betting and gaming sector. However you identify, across any protected characteristic, our ambition is to ensure our‚ÄØpeople across the globe feel valued, respected and their individuality celebrated.
   

  

 We comply with all applicable recruitment regulations and employment laws in the jurisdictions where we operate, ensuring ethical and compliant hiring practices globally.
   

  

*Should you need any adjustments or accommodations to the recruitment process, at either application or interview, please contact us.*

title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Job Description** 




 We are seeking a Senior Quality Assurance Engineer with 8‚Äì10 years of experience who brings deep expertise in manual testing and strong hands\\-on experience in test automation using Selenium and/or Playwright. This role involves owning quality across websites, web applications, and mobile applications, mentoring junior QA engineers, and driving test strategy and automation adoption across projects.
 



  





**Roles, Responsibilities and Duties / Tasks and duties that define the role** 




**Key Responsibilities** 




 Manual \\& Functional Testing Leadership
 



 ÔÇ∑ Own end\\-to\\-end test planning, estimation, and execution across projects
 



 ÔÇ∑ Translate business and technical requirements into comprehensive test strategies, scenarios, and test cases
 



 ÔÇ∑ Perform functional, integration, system, regression, UAT support, and exploratory testing
 



 ÔÇ∑ Validate UI/UX, cross\\-browser compatibility, accessibility, and usability standards
 



 ÔÇ∑ Lead mobile application testing efforts for Android and iOS platforms
 



 ÔÇ∑ Drive defect triage, root cause analysis, and quality risk assessment
 



 ÔÇ∑ Collaborate closely with Product Owners, Architects, Developers, and business stakeholders
 



  





  





**Automation Testing and Quality Engineering** 




 ÔÇ∑ Design, develop, and maintain scalable automation frameworks using Selenium and/or Playwright
 



 ÔÇ∑ Identify high\\-value test scenarios for automation and improve automation coverage
 



 ÔÇ∑ Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines
 



 ÔÇ∑ Analyze automation results and ensure stability and reliability of test suites
 



 ÔÇ∑ Guide teams on automation best practices, coding standards, and test data management
 



 ÔÇ∑ Evaluate and recommend testing tools, frameworks, and process improvements
 



  





**Must\\-Have Skills** 




 ÔÇ∑ 4‚Äì10 years of experience in Quality Assurance across manual and automation testing
 



 ÔÇ∑ Strong experience testing complex web applications and enterprise systems
 



 ÔÇ∑ Hands\\-on automation experience with Selenium and/or Playwright
 



 ÔÇ∑ Good programming knowledge in Java, JavaScript, or TypeScript
 



 ÔÇ∑ Solid understanding of SDLC, STLC, Agile/Scrum, and DevOps practices
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience with defect management and test management tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail)
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience with cross\\-browser and cross\\-device testing
 



 ÔÇ∑ Excellent analytical, communication, and stakeholder management skills
 



  





**Good to have Skills** 




 ÔÇ∑ Experience with mobile automation tools such as Appium
 



 ÔÇ∑ Exposure to performance or security testing
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience working with cloud platforms and microservices\\-based systems
 



 ÔÇ∑ Prior experience mentoring or leading QA teams
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience working in CI/CD\\-driven delivery environments

title: Principal Engineer Platform
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

 As a Platform Engineer within our dynamic Innovation Lab team, you'll be at the forefront of technological advancements, driving the design and implementation of cutting\\-edge platform solutions (including standing up sandboxes using dependent (existing) technologies). Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping the architecture of innovative projects, ensuring scalability, reliability, and seamless integration of diverse systems, focusing on areas such as generative AI, advanced analytics, and the latest in digital and cloud technologies. Your expertise in cloud platforms, container orchestration, and DevOps practices will contribute to the creation of a robust and efficient technological landscape. Embrace the opportunity to pioneer groundbreaking technologies, automate operational processes, and mentor a collaborative team, all while staying ahead of industry trends. Join us in redefining what's possible and be a key player in the evolution of our Innovation Lab's technological vision.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will be comfortable with the dynamic nature of the Innovation Lab, and therefore dealing with ambiguity and adaptive working practices.
   

  

**Essential Functions**
* Participate, and provide input, in the development and execution of a technology strategy for the Innovation Lab that aligns with the company's business goals and innovation objectives.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design, implement, and maintain robust, scalable platform solutions for innovative projects within the Innovation Lab.
* Drive the development of cutting\\-edge technologies and frameworks to enhance the overall platform architecture.
* Ensure the seamless integration of diverse systems and services, optimizing performance and reliability.
* Proactively identify and address potential bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and performance issues in the platform infrastructure.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tools, fostering a culture of innovation and efficiency.
* Work closely with DevOps, software engineers, and other stakeholders to streamline deployment pipelines and automate operational processes.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies, evaluating their potential application to enhance the lab's technological landscape.
* Provide mentorship and knowledge\\-sharing within the team, promoting a collaborative and learning\\-oriented environment.
* Participate in the creation of technical documentation, ensuring clarity and accessibility for team members.


**Qualifications**
* 12\\+ years in software systems development and delivery with demonstrable experience in innovation and emerging technologies.
* 7\\+ years of experience in solution architecture across multiple domains, with a recent focus on digital transformation
* Proven experience as a Platform Engineer or similar role, with a focus on innovative technology solutions.
* Strong expertise in designing and implementing scalable and resilient platform architectures.
* Proficient in Java, with experience in microservices and containerization.
* Expertise in a broad range of technologies, such as API Gateway/Web Services, Messaging \\& RESTful architectures
* Hands\\-on experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, or GCP) and container orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes).
* Solid understanding of DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure\\-as\\-code principles.
* Familiarity with security best practices and the ability to implement security measures within the platform.
* Proven experience in the financial industry, with an understanding of how technology impacts business processes and outcomes.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a dynamic team environment.
* Acting under consultative direction, responsible for managing medium to moderately complex projects, including project planning, prioritization, execution, timing, functionality, quality and cost within an assigned division or business unit. Under general direction, Project Manager is accountable for anticipating risks, escalating risks, resolving barriers in order to drive project success.
* MODE \\- Remote


 This job description is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications of the job. The employer has the right to revise this job description at any time. You will be evaluated in part based on your performance of the responsibilities and/or tasks listed in this job description. You may be required perform other duties that are not included on this job description. The job description is not a contract for employment, and either you or the employer may terminate employment at any time, for any reason.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to diversity. All individuals, regardless of personal characteristics, are encouraged to apply. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, religion, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable state or local law.
